calcGear.title: Governor Gear Calculator
calcGear.desc: Use this quick Kingshot governor gear calculator.

howto.title: How to Use
howto.step1: Select your current governor gear level.
howto.step2: Select the target level you want to upgrade to.
howto.step3: Choose the gear slots to upgrade from the tabs.

notice.title: Notes
notice.p1: This is fan-made data based on in-game values.
notice.li1: Numbers may change due to patches/balance adjustments.
notice.li2: Please report typos or errors via Contact.

alerts.invalidRange: The current level must be lower than the target level.

misc.hint: Sum multiple slots at once. If costs differ by slot, provide per-slot steps via stepsMap.
